title: Investor Who Made $20 Million on Nvidia Stock Reveals the Next Big Opportunity
full_text: Investor Who Made $20 Million on Nvidia Stock Reveals the Next Big Opportunity. Investing in Nvidia 10 years ago would have netted a 21,000% return. However, that also meant taking a big bet on the company back when it was a crypto stock.... Investing in Nvidia a decade ago would have delivered a roughly 21,000% return. That kind of gain, however, required making a big bet on the company back when it was largely viewed as a crypto-adjace… [+3586 chars]
